A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst plot and story ever for me in the star wars films . She is not relatable and realistic as a character and for its pro feminist agenda its even worse 2nd) Snoke the most powerful of the dark lords in his time\, falls in two seconds to someone far weaker than him in the force and even if you could make the argument that Ren could over through him we do not know enough about snoke to make a great argument for or against.  3rd) The whole save the animals thing.
